site_name: Land To The Rear Of 43-45 Rosebank Road (Bostonthorpe Road)
decision_conditions: The submitted information of details in pursuant to condition 14 of planning permission Ref: 220720FUL dated 29.04.2022 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policy1.1 (j) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and the Policy 5.21 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of verification report pursuant to condition 14 of planning permission Ref: 220720FUL dated 29.04.2022 "Construction of a 2 storey dwelling house with provision of bin store, cycle storage and private amenity space"
